Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.AdaptersAPI
    This interface is deprecated since V8.0, use AdaptersAPI instead.
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.AnalyticsAPI
    This interface is deprecated since V8.0, use AnalyticsAPI instead.
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.ConfigurationAPI
    This interface is deprecated since V8.0, use ConfigurationAPI instead.
    com.worklight.core.auth.OAuthSecurity
    Use OAuthSecurity instead
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.WLFilter
    Deprecated since V8.0. Use the Jax-RS 2.0 Filter interface instead.
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.WLFilterMappings
    Deprecated since V8.0. Use the Jax-RS 2.0 Filter interface instead.
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.WLServerAPI
    This interface is deprecated since V8.0, and is only available for backwards compatibility. Use the Jax-RS javax.ws.rs.core.Context annotation to inject the API interfaces directly.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.worklight.wink.extensions.MFPJAXRSApplication
    Deprecated since V8.0, use {MFPJAXRSApplication instead.
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.WLServerAPIProvider
    This class is deprecated since V8.0, and is only available for backwards compatibility. Use the Jax-RS javax.ws.rs.core.Context annotation to inject the API interfaces directly.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.MFPServerOAuthException
    Since version 8.0 this exception is never thrown.
    com.worklight.adapters.rest.api.MFPServerOperationException
    Since version 8.0 this exception is never thrown.
